resource.chars:
Reasons: Because I am the only one on the farm to manage and work the horses and to do the heavy work, especially now as my father is often troubled with passing gall stones, and is attended by Dr J W Stephens, Cardigan for same, and it would be a serious hardship to all concerned that I should be compelled to leave the farm.
Signature: George Richards Davis
Address: as already stated
Occupation, profession or business: as already stated
Why application made by applicant for the man: By the man and employer
Date of application: 1916-02-15T10:16:16.000Z
Decision of the Tribunal: Temporary exemption for 6 months. Conditionally on remaining in present occupation.
D. James, Chairman of Tribunal
Feby. 23 1916
Tag: Beige R41/42: Page 2
